tabs.title: Introduction
tabs.content:
Do you have what it takes to recognise a pattern in chaos?

Here’s your ticket to this invigorating event which is an amalgamation of astuteness and dexterity.

Delve… Decipher…. and Demand trial by Code!

tabs.title: Format
tabs.content:
ROUND 1:
Duration: 45 min-60 min
The participant's adroitness in programming ability and his erudition on famous algorithms will be put under the scanner.
Questions test the participant's knack of correcting and optimising code.

ROUND 2:
Duration : 60 min
This round requires the contestants to be able to obfuscate and make his code as unobtrusive as possible.

ROUND 3:
Duration : 1hr(+30 min)
Code for a game with misplaced logic, missing dependencies, incomplete snippets, etc. is given.
The code must be corrected to work properly.

tabs.title: Rules
tabs.content:
» Each team can consist of a minimum of one member and a maximum of two members.
» The members of a team can be from different colleges/institutions.
» All students must have a valid k! ID to participate.
» No contestant can be a member of more than one team.
» The participants are not allowed to bring any additional material.
» Teams involved in any kind of malpractice will be immediately disqualified.
» The decisions by the judges will be final and binding.
